title: So League of Legends Facebook changed their profile picture to Lux
body:
And theres an ultimate skin coming up. Coincidence?
Top: empty
Jungle: Spirit Guard Udyr
Mid: empty?
Adc: Pulsefire Ezreal
Support: DJ Sona
If Lux is getting an Ultimate skin what will it be?
Edit: They changed from sona to nid's cat by accident, then immeadily swapped to Lux 1 min after.

replies.body:
They change it to Lux every few months.
It's been like that for a really long time (Even before DJ Sona, I think).
No special reason I think. She's one of League's most iconic characters though, so I guess it's that. They also sometimes change it to Teeto if remember correctly. :P

Doesn't Star Guardian count as an ultimate skin?

Keep in mind they posted fizz there at one point recently as well

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zlAyMwwX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-15T14:06:32.555+0000)
>
> Doesn't Star Guardian count as an ultimate skin?
> 
> Keep in mind they posted fizz there at one point recently as well

I think Star Guardian Lux is a Legendary Skin, it offers to little for an ultimate skin, not to mention that an ultimate skin is around 3100 RP
Star Guardian Lux is 1350 rp, it isent even legendary. Plus the fact it was released a year ago there is a chance for lux to get a new skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zlAyMwwX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-15T14:06:32.555+0000)
>
> Doesn't Star Guardian count as an ultimate skin?
> 
> Keep in mind they posted fizz there at one point recently as well

Keep in mind that they changed to fizz on may 20th, a week before the release of super galaxy fizz. I do not think that he is going to get 2 high quality skins with in 3 months of each other.
I have seen their profile picture set to lux alot before
im just gonna ban lux 100% of the time if they release it, she's annoying enough as it is xD
I severely doubt it. Lux is not wanting for cool skins.
